PSG / Borussia Dortmund: Piszczek reacts to the rumor!
≈Åukasz Piszczek does not close the door to a visit to PSG, as he announced in an interview with a Polish newspaper.
04 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Hugo Deloraine



1. Real Madrid (146,000) While some teams are not fully qualified, others already have their place for the upcoming European campaign. Discover the UEFA coefficient of qualified teams (or almost) .Icon Sport

PSG, Lille, OL: all the coefficients of the teams qualified for the C1




Thomas Meunier has never been favored by Thomas Tuchel, PSG have already targeted several players for the winter transfer window to replace the Belgian side. In recent weeks, the name of ≈Åukasz Piszczek returns regularly to strengthen the ranks of Paris. Questioned at the microphone of the daily PrzeglƒÖd Sportowy, the side of Borussia Dortmund reacted to this rumor.




"PSG? It was a sensation for me too"




≈Åukasz Piszczek + 33 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"PSG? It was a sensation for me too," he said. However, he favors an extension to Borussia, even if the ball is in the camp of its leaders: "The priority is given to the extension of the contract with the BVB, we will see if the authorities of the club will also want it". What is certain is that the Polish international does not intend to stop immediately: "I intend to play football until June 2021. Someone may think that since you have 34 years old, you are free, but when I look at statistics (8 appearances in the Bundesliga, 2 assists), it shows that I'm not the slowest, which is why I prefer the term experienced rather than old. "
